short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PetNet is a delightful blend of practicality (utilizing Microsoft Bing Search) and whimsy, designed for pet lovers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing “PetNet: Your Furry Friend’s Web Explorer”! 🐾

This isn’t just your average web search tool. It’s a delightful blend of practicality and whimsy, designed for pet lovers and curious minds alike.

With PetNet, you can navigate the vast expanse of the internet with ease. Looking for the latest news? Want to know the weather forecast? Or maybe you’re just in the mood for some cute animal videos? Just type in your query and let PetNet fetch the results for you!

But that’s not all. PetNet has a unique feature that sets it apart from other extensions. At the click of a button, it generates a random pet name for you! Whether you’re welcoming a new furry friend into your home, or just in need of a chuckle, PetNet’s got you covered. From the classic “Fido” and “Whiskers”, to the more adventurous “Sir Barksalot” and “Madame Purrfect”, you never know what PetNet will come up with next!

So why wait? Add a touch of fun to your browsing experience with PetNet: Your Furry Friend’s Web Explorer. Happy surfing, and may your future be filled with adorable pets! 🐶🐱

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing The PetNew extension and setting Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your Chrome New Tab search engine to Microsoft Bing.
